subject: Re: [junit] automating junit tests.
msgSnippet: -- Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales). http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/ ... Google junit recipes ... Google junit parameterized test cases ... Google junit
messageBody:
--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

skkcr wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> I am new to junit.
>
> 1. How to AUTOMATE the a junit testcase where the test methods can be
> tested with expected, unexpected and null method parameters.

Google "junit recipes"

>
> 2. Is there a way that the method parameter values can be passed by
> user to junit during the run/design time.

Google "junit parameterized test cases"

>
> 3. Is white and black box testing possible using Junit.

Google "junit recipes"

>
> Please let me know if there are any suitable solutions/alternatives in
> Junit.

Google "junit alternatives"

>
> Thanks in advance.
>
